hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: vcfIndex
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: S3 location of vcf index file

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
ls -l
mkdir -p data
aws s3 cp ${vcfIndex} vcfIndex.tsv
studyId=$(head -n 1 vcfIndex.tsv | tr -d '"')
rm -rf data/${studyId} mkdir -p data/${studyId} mkdir -p data/${studyId}/all mkdir -p data/${studyId}/merged mkdir -p data/vcfInput
for i in 21; do sed -n "2p" vcfIndex.tsv > "data/${studyId}/chr${i}VcfIndex.tsv" sed -n "3p" vcfIndex.tsv >> "data/${studyId}/chr${i}VcfIndex.tsv" done
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-biodatacatalyst-deployments-3drb48r/genomic-etl/hpds_vcfs/modifiers_removed/${studyId}.chr21.annotated_remove_modifiers.hpds.vcf.gz data/vcfInput/
for i in 21; do #rm -f data/vcfInput/${studyId}.chr${i}.annotated_remove_modifiers.hpds.vcf gunzip data/vcfInput/${studyId}.chr${i}.annotated_remove_modifiers.hpds.vcf.gz
#creates files for the headers, then sort the rest of the lines by position grep "#" data/vcfInput/${studyId}.chr${i}.annotated_remove_modifiers.hpds.vcf > data/vcfInput/${studyId}.chr${i}.headers.vcf grep -v "#" data/vcfInput/${studyId}.chr${i}.annotated_remove_modifiers.hpds.vcf | sort -k2n >> data/vcfInput/${studyId}.chr${i}.resort.vcf
cat data/vcfInput/${studyId}.chr${i}.headers.vcf > data/vcfInput/${studyId}.chr${i}.annotated_remove_modifiers.hpds.vcf rm data/vcfInput/${studyId}.chr${i}.headers.vcf cat data/vcfInput/${studyId}.chr${i}.resort.vcf >> data/vcfInput/${studyId}.chr${i}.annotated_remove_modifiers.hpds.vcf rm data/vcfInput/${studyId}.chr${i}.resort.vcf bgzip -c data/vcfInput/${studyId}.chr${i}.annotated_remove_modifiers.hpds.vcf > data/vcfInput/${studyId}.chr${i}.annotated_remove_modifiers.hpds.vcf.gz rm data/vcfInput/${studyId}.chr${i}.annotated_remove_modifiers.hpds.vcf done

studyId=$(head -n 1 vcfIndex.tsv | tr -d '"')
mkdir -p "data/${studyId}/${i}/all" mkdir -p "data/${studyId}/${i}/merged"
for i in 21; do mkdir -p "data/${studyId}/${i}/all" mkdir -p "data/${studyId}/${i}/merged"
java ${javaOpts} -jar docker/pic-sure-hpds-etl/VCFLocalLoader-jar-with-dependencies.jar data/${studyId}/chr${i}VcfIndex.tsv data/${studyId}/${i}/all data/${studyId}/${i}/merged ### assume etl role unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 3600 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 sync "data/${studyId}/${i}/all" "s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/genomics_javabins/9b/v4.1/${studyId}/${i}/" done
rm -rf data/${studyId} rm -rf data/vcfInput/${studyId}*
